name: Kailash Manasarovar Yatra
shortDescription: Experience the sacred journey to Mount Kailash, the eternal dwelling of Lord Shiva, and take a holy dip in Lake Manasarovar.
description: Mount Kailash is the eternal dwelling place of Lord Shiva, where he resides with Goddess Parvati in a state of eternal meditation. This is the spiritual center of the universe for over a billion Hindus. The Kailash Manasarovar Yatra is a once-in-a-lifetime pilgrimage that takes you through breathtaking Himalayan landscapes to one of the most sacred mountains in the world. Experience the 52-kilometer Parikrama (circumambulation) and take a holy dip in the pristine waters of Lake Manasarovar.
exclusions: Any services not mentioned in inclusions

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Welcome to Nepal! Transfer to hotel. Evening briefing about the yatra.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Pashupatinath Temple and prepare for the journey ahead. Permit processing.

itinerary.title: Fly to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Early morning flight to Nepalgunj. Rest and acclimatization.

itinerary.title: Fly to Simikot
itinerary.description: Scenic flight to Simikot (2,950m). Begin the Himalayan adventure.

itinerary.title: Trek to Dharapori
itinerary.description: Start the trek along the Humla Karnali River.

itinerary.title: Trek to Til
itinerary.description: Continue through remote villages with stunning valley views.

itinerary.title: Cross to Tibet - Purang
itinerary.description: Cross the Nara La Pass (4,580m) into Tibet. Immigration at Hilsa.

itinerary.title: Purang to Manasarovar
itinerary.description: Drive to the sacred Lake Manasarovar. Evening puja at the lake.

itinerary.title: Manasarovar Holy Dip
itinerary.description: Early morning holy bath in Lake Manasarovar. Meditation and prayers.

itinerary.title: Darchen - Parikrama Day 1
itinerary.description: Drive to Darchen and begin the sacred Parikrama. Trek to Dirapuk.

itinerary.title: Parikrama Day 2 - Dolma La
itinerary.description: Cross Dolma La Pass (5,630m), the highest point. Descend to Zuthulpuk.

itinerary.title: Complete Parikrama
itinerary.description: Complete the Parikrama and return to Darchen. Celebratory puja.

itinerary.title: Return to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Fly back to Kathmandu via Simikot. Farewell dinner.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport. Tour ends with divine blessings.

requirements: Valid passport with minimum 6 months validity
cancellationPolicy:
50% refund if cancelled 30 days before departure
25% refund if cancelled 15-30 days before
No refund for cancellations less than 15 days before departure

name: Chardham Yatra
shortDescription: Visit the four sacred Hindu pilgrimage sites of Yamunotri, Gangotri, Kedarnath, and Badrinath in the majestic Himalayas.
description: The Chardham Yatra is one of the most sacred pilgrimages in Hinduism, visiting four divine abodes in Uttarakhand. Yamunotri (source of River Yamuna), Gangotri (origin of River Ganga), Kedarnath (one of 12 Jyotirlingas), and Badrinath (abode of Lord Vishnu) form this holy circuit. Complete this sacred journey and attain moksha.

itinerary.title: Delhi to Haridwar
itinerary.description: Depart from Delhi and drive to Haridwar. Evening Ganga Aarti.

itinerary.title: Haridwar to Barkot
itinerary.description: Drive towards Yamunotri base. En route visit Kempty Falls.

itinerary.title: Yamunotri Darshan
itinerary.description: Trek to Yamunotri Temple (6km). Take darshan and holy dip.

itinerary.title: Barkot to Uttarkashi
itinerary.description: Drive to Uttarkashi, a major pilgrimage center.

itinerary.title: Gangotri Darshan
itinerary.description: Early morning drive to Gangotri. Temple darshan and puja.

itinerary.title: Uttarkashi to Guptkashi
itinerary.description: Scenic drive to Guptkashi via Tehri Dam.

itinerary.title: Kedarnath Trek
itinerary.description: Early morning trek/helicopter to Kedarnath. Evening aarti.

itinerary.title: Kedarnath to Guptkashi
itinerary.description: Morning darshan and return trek to Gaurikund.

itinerary.title: Guptkashi to Badrinath
itinerary.description: Drive to Badrinath via Joshimath.

itinerary.title: Badrinath Darshan
itinerary.description: Morning darshan at Badrinath Temple. Visit Mana Village.

itinerary.title: Badrinath to Rudraprayag
itinerary.description: Return journey with stops at Panchprayag.

itinerary.title: Rudraprayag to Delhi
itinerary.description: Final drive back to Delhi. Tour ends.

requirements: Medical fitness certificate for elderly pilgrims

name: 12 Jyotirlinga Darshan
shortDescription: Complete the sacred circuit of all 12 Jyotirlingas across India - the divine manifestations of Lord Shiva.
description: The 12 Jyotirlingas are the most sacred shrines dedicated to Lord Shiva. These temples are spread across India, and visiting all of them is considered one of the holiest pilgrimages. From Somnath in Gujarat to Mallikarjuna in Andhra Pradesh, experience the divine energy of Lord Shiva in all his manifestations.
inclusions: All temple entry fees and VIP darshan where available

itinerary.title: Somnath Jyotirlinga
itinerary.description: Begin the sacred journey at Somnath, the first Jyotirlinga.

itinerary.title: Nageshwar Jyotirlinga
itinerary.description: Visit Nageshwar near Dwarka, Gujarat.

itinerary.title: Bhimashankar Jyotirlinga
itinerary.description: Journey to Bhimashankar in the Sahyadri hills of Maharashtra.

itinerary.title: Trimbakeshwar Jyotirlinga
itinerary.description: Visit Trimbakeshwar near Nashik, source of River Godavari.

itinerary.title: Grishneshwar Jyotirlinga
itinerary.description: Visit Grishneshwar near Ellora Caves.

itinerary.title: Mahakaleshwar Jyotirlinga
itinerary.description: Experience the powerful Bhasma Aarti at Ujjain.

itinerary.title: Omkareshwar Jyotirlinga
itinerary.description: Visit Omkareshwar on the island of Mandhata.

itinerary.title: Rest Day
itinerary.description: Rest and reflection day.

itinerary.title: Kedarnath Jyotirlinga
itinerary.description: Trek to Kedarnath in the Himalayas.

itinerary.title: Kedarnath Darshan
itinerary.description: Morning darshan and return.

itinerary.title: Kashi Vishwanath
itinerary.description: Visit the ancient Kashi Vishwanath in Varanasi.

itinerary.title: Varanasi Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Ganga Aarti and sightseeing in the spiritual capital.

itinerary.title: Baidyanath Jyotirlinga
itinerary.description: Visit Baidyanath Dham in Jharkhand.

itinerary.title: Travel Day
itinerary.description: Journey towards South India.

itinerary.title: Mallikarjuna Jyotirlinga
itinerary.description: Visit Srisailam in Andhra Pradesh.

itinerary.title: Rameshwaram Jyotirlinga
itinerary.description: Visit Rameshwaram, one of the Char Dhams.

itinerary.title: Rameshwaram Darshan
itinerary.description: Complete darshan and rituals.

itinerary.title: Travel Day
itinerary.description: Journey northward.

itinerary.title: Rest Day
itinerary.description: Rest and relaxation.

itinerary.title: Final Preparations
itinerary.description: Prepare for journey home.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Sacred journey concludes with divine blessings.

name: Divya Desam
shortDescription: Visit the 108 sacred Vishnu temples sung by the Alvar saints across South India and Nepal.
description: The 108 Divya Desams are the most sacred Vishnu temples glorified by the 12 Alvar saints. These temples are primarily located in Tamil Nadu, with others in Kerala, Andhra Pradesh, and one in Nepal. This comprehensive tour takes you through all 108 temples in a spiritually enriching journey.

itinerary.title: Begin from Chennai
itinerary.description: Start the 108 Divya Desam journey from Chennai. Visit temples in Chennai region.

itinerary.title: Kanchipuram Temples
itinerary.description: Visit Varadaraja Perumal and other Divya Desams in Kanchipuram.

itinerary.title: Tirumala Tirupati
itinerary.description: World-famous Tirumala Venkateswara Temple darshan.

itinerary.title: Srirangam
itinerary.description: Visit the largest temple complex - Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple.

itinerary.title: Madurai Region
itinerary.description: Visit Divya Desams in and around Madurai.

requirements: Physical stamina for extensive temple visits
Appropriate traditional attire for temple visits

name: Adi Kailash & Om Parvat
shortDescription: Trek to Adi Kailash, also known as Chhota Kailash, and witness the sacred Om symbol on Om Parvat.
description: Adi Kailash, located in the Indian Himalayas near the Tibet border, is considered as sacred as Mount Kailash. The trek also includes a darshan of Om Parvat, where natural snow formation creates the sacred Om symbol. This is an excellent alternative for those unable to undertake the Tibet Kailash yatra.

itinerary.title: Delhi to Kathgodam
itinerary.description: Overnight train journey to Kathgodam.

itinerary.title: Kathgodam to Dharchula
itinerary.description: Scenic drive through Kumaon hills.

itinerary.title: Dharchula to Tawaghat
itinerary.description: Drive along Kali River to Tawaghat.

itinerary.title: Tawaghat to Pangu
itinerary.description: Begin the trek through remote villages.

itinerary.title: Pangu to Nabi
itinerary.description: Trek through rhododendron forests.

itinerary.title: Nabi to Jolingkong
itinerary.description: Reach Jolingkong with Adi Kailash views.

itinerary.title: Adi Kailash Parikrama
itinerary.description: Complete the sacred Parikrama. Evening at Parvati Tal.

itinerary.title: Om Parvat Darshan
itinerary.description: Early morning darshan of Om Parvat. Return to Nabi.

itinerary.title: Nabi to Dharchula
itinerary.description: Complete return trek and drive.

itinerary.title: Dharchula to Delhi
itinerary.description: Return journey to Delhi. Tour ends.

requirements: Valid ID proof (Aadhar mandatory for Inner Line Permit)

name: Panch Kedar Yatra
shortDescription: Visit the five sacred Shiva temples in the Garhwal Himalayas - Kedarnath, Tungnath, Rudranath, Madhyamaheshwar, and Kalpeshwar.
description: The Panch Kedar temples are five sacred Shiva temples located in the Garhwal region of Uttarakhand. According to legend, Lord Shiva took the form of a bull to hide from the Pandavas, and his body parts emerged at these five locations. This challenging trek covers all five temples in the majestic Himalayan landscape.

itinerary.title: Rishikesh to Guptkashi
itinerary.description: Drive from Rishikesh to Guptkashi base camp.

itinerary.title: Kedarnath Trek
itinerary.description: Trek to Kedarnath - the main temple of Panch Kedar.

itinerary.title: Kedarnath Darshan
itinerary.description: Morning darshan and return to Gaurikund.

itinerary.title: To Ukhimath
itinerary.description: Drive to Ukhimath for Madhyamaheshwar trek.

itinerary.title: Madhyamaheshwar Trek
itinerary.description: Trek to Madhyamaheshwar through alpine meadows.

itinerary.title: Madhyamaheshwar Darshan
itinerary.description: Morning puja and return trek.

itinerary.title: To Chopta
itinerary.description: Drive to Chopta, base for Tungnath.

itinerary.title: Tungnath & Chandrashila
itinerary.description: Trek to highest Shiva temple and Chandrashila peak.

itinerary.title: To Urgam Valley
itinerary.description: Drive towards Kalpeshwar.

itinerary.title: Kalpeshwar Darshan
itinerary.description: Easy trek to Kalpeshwar, open throughout the year.

itinerary.title: To Mandal
itinerary.description: Drive to Mandal, base for Rudranath.

itinerary.title: Rudranath Trek
itinerary.description: Challenging trek to Rudranath through forests.

itinerary.title: Rudranath Darshan
itinerary.description: Morning darshan and return trek.

itinerary.title: Return to Rishikesh
itinerary.description: Drive back to Rishikesh. Tour ends with blessings.

name: Tirumala Package
shortDescription: Test tour package for payment testing. 10% deposit = ₹10.
description: This is a test tour package created for payment system testing. The price is set to ₹100 per person, which means a 10% deposit equals ₹10 - perfect for testing the Razorpay payment integration without spending much.

itinerary.title: Test Package
itinerary.description: This is a test package for payment integration testing.
